effect.short: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target
loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
